snippet: A judge asked a lawyer whether he had reported allegations of criminal interference with emergency room services at Long Island College Hospital to the Brooklyn district attorney.
lead_paragraph: A judge asked a lawyer whether he had reported allegations of criminal interference with emergency room services at Long Island College Hospital to the Brooklyn district attorney.

headline.main: Judge Raises Prospect of Criminal Charges in Hospital Case
headline.print_headline: Judge Raises Prospect of Criminal Charges in Hospital Case
